TEXT.English: When the Age of Ice came upon Erebus, civilized men abandoned their cities and fled to the caves. In the darkness below the world, some managed to maintain their former society and heritage and waited out the Ice Age amongst friends. Others however were not so fortunate in their choice of cave. One such group were the Archos - a minor barbarian tribe during the Age of Magic. Fleeing the surface as the blizzards blasted their village, the Archosians fled into a large cave-complex. [PARAGRAPH:1]The tribe had not expected to abandon their village and had little time to prepare supplies in their hurried flight. The caves themselves offered little - save for shelter - and in desperation the tribe turned to eating the insects that dwelled in the upper caves. Scouts were sent to investigate further into the caves to find other food and when they returned days later, they carried with them a number of spider carcasses - each roughly the size of a man's head. The caves below teemed with these creatures and it seemed that - whilst unpleasant tasting - they would provide adequete food. A few tribesmen became ill at first, but over the years they developed an immunity to the poison. [PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]The immunity was not complete however. Slowly but surely the poison was building up in the bodies of the tribesmen and being passed down to the next generation. Some of the newborn showed signs of mutation or disfigurement and almost all took on an unhealthy looking pallour. Shortly before the time that the ice began to recede, a cult emerged amongst members of the tribe and centred around the worship of the spiders. The cult did not stop consuming the young spiders, but treated the meal more as a ritual than a method of survival. For each meal, they gave thanks to a greater spider, commonly called "Mother".[PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]With the fall of Mulcarn and the dawning of the Age of Rebirth, the tribe emerged from the caves and resettled on the surface. Whilst the majority of the the tribesmen returned to the old ways, the Spider-Cult gained strength. They are still a minority in the village, but a significant one and they wield much power. Where the tribesmen are brutish and aggressive, the cult manipulates their strength to do Mother's bidding.
TEXT.French: Quand l'Ère Glaciaire s'installa sur Erebus, les hommes civilisés abandonnèrent leurs villes et fuirent dans les grottes. Dans les ténèbres souterraines, certains réussirent à maintenir leurs anciennes sociétés et héritages, et attendirent la fin de l'Ère Galciaire entre amis. Cependant, certains n'eurent pas cette chance dans le choix de leur grotte. Un de ces groupe étaient les Archosiens, un clan mineur de barbares durant l'Âge de Magie. Fuyant la surface tandis que les blizzards détruisaient leur village, les Archosiens se réfugièrent dans un grand réseau de grottes.[PARAGRAPH:1]Le clan n'avait pas imaginé abandonner son village et eut peu de temps pour préparer les vivres dans leur fuite précipitée. Les grottes elles-mêmes avaient peu à offrir, si ce n'est la protection de l'abri, et en désespoir de cause le clan se mit à manger les insectes qui grouillaient dans les grottes proches de la surface. Des éclaireurs furent envoyés en reconnaissance plus profondément dans les grottes afin de trouver une autres source de nourriture. Quand ils revinrent quelques jours plus tard, ils transportaient quelques carcasses d'Araignées, chacun faisant approximativement la taille d'un crâne humain. Les grottes plus en profondeur regorgaient de ces créatures, et il semblait que malgré leur goût désagréable, elles fourniraient une source de nourriture adéquate. Quelques membres du clan tombèrent malades au début, mais au fil des ans ils développèrent une immunité au poison.[PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]Cette immunité n'était cependant pas complète. Doucement mais sûrement, le poison se répandit dans les corps des membres de la tribu et fut transmis à la génération suivante. Certains des nouveaux-nés présentaient des signes de mutations ou étaient défigurés et pratiquement tous avaient un teint malade. Peu de temps avant que la glace ne commence à reculer, une culte émergea des membres du clan, centré autour de l'Araignée. Le culte ne mit pas fin à la consommation des jeunes araignées, mais traitaient les repas plus comme un rituel que comme une méthode de survie. Pour chaque repas, ils remerciaient une araignée supérieure, communément appelée "la Mère".[PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]Avec la chute de Mulcarn et l'aube de l'Âge de la Renaissance, le clan émergea des grottes et recolonisa la surface. Tandis que la majorité des membres du clan revinrent à leur ancien mode de vie, le Culte de l'Araignée gagna en force. Ses membres sont toujours minoritaires dans le village, mais une minorité importante et ils possèdent beaucoup de pouvoir. Tandis que les membres deu clan sont brutaux et aggressifs, le culte les manipule et utilise leur force pour les desseins de la Mère.

TEXT.Italian: Quando l'Era del Ghiaccio arrivò su Erebus, gli uomini civilizzati abbandonarono le loro città e fuggirono nelle grotte. Nell'oscurita sotto al mondo, alcuni riuscirono a mantenere la loro società intatta cosi come le loro tradizioni e attesero la fine dell'Era del Ghiaccio tra amici. Altri invece non furono cosi fortunati nella scelta delle grotte. Uno di questi gruppi erano gli Archos, una piccola tribù barbara dell'Era della Magia. Fuggendo dalla superfice in cui delle tempeste di neve hanno distrutto il loro villaggio gli Archosiani trovarono rifugio in un grande complesso di grotte. [PARAGRAPH:1]La tribù non si aspettava di dover abbandonare il loro villaggio e non ebbero il tempo per preparare dei rifornimenti nella loro frettolosa fuga. Le grotte stesse offrivano poco altro oltre al riparo, in preda alla disperazione la tribù iniziò a mangiare gli insetti che abitavano le grotte superiori. Dei ricognitori furono mandati ad esplorare le grotte più in profondità per cercare altro cibo, quando tornarono nei giorni successivi portarono con loro delle carcasse di ragni, ognuna delle dimensioni di una testa umana. Le grotte sottostanti erano piene di queste creature e sembrava che, sebbene non avessero un buon sapore, potevano fornire un'alimetazione adeguata. Qualche membro della tribù si ammalò all'inizio, ma col passare degli anni svilupparono un'immunità al veleno. [PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]L'immunità non era totale però. Lentamente il veleno si stava accumulando nei corpi della tribù venendo addirittura passato alle nuove generazioni. Alcuni dei neonati mostrarono segni di mutazione e quasi tutti avevano un pallore come fossero malati. Poco prima che il ghiaccio iniziò a sciogliersi, un culto emerse tra i membri della tribù centrato sulla venerazione dei ragni. I culto non era contro il mangiare i ragni giovani, ma ne ritualizzò l'azione. Ogni volta che li mangiavano, ringraziavano un ragno supremo, comunemente chiamato "Madre".[PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]Con la caduta di Mulcarn e l'iizio dell'Era della Rinascita, la tribù lasciò le grotte e si ri insediò sulla superfice. Mentre la maggior parte della tribù tornò alle vecchie usanze, il Culto dei Ragni aumentò il suo potere. Sono ancora una minoranza all'interno del villaggio, ma comunque sognificativa e dispongono di parecchio potere. Mentre i membri della tribù sono brutali e aggressivi, il culto manipola i loro punti di forza per compiere la volonta di Madre.

TEXT.English: Strategy: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The Archosians spiders and scorpions excel at denying exploration and expansion of other civs. They do this through the use of their spiders (see: [LINK=UNIT_SPIDER]Archosian Spider[\LINK] Strategy and Mechanics).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Their [LINK=UNIT_SCORPION]scorpions[\LINK] act as supplements to their troops, also spawning through [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE_ARCHOS]Mother's Nest[\LINK] (the Archosian Palace), but with different properties. They do not have hidden nationality, and their attacks poison enemies, more useful for stopping healing units and wearing them down, whereas Spiders are better at zone control, picking off undefended units and ambushing from stealth. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Archosian spiders have hidden nationality, meaning they can enter other players territory without declaring war. However, they can't [LINK=SPELL_DECLARE_NATIONALITY]reveal their nationality[\LINK] and hence can't capture cities. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Archosian spiders are not built. Instead, they spawn from [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE_ARCHOS]Mother's Nest[\LINK] (the Archosian Palace). Capital population changes their strength and size (4+ baby, 8+ Adult, and 12+ for Giant Spiders). [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Mother's Nest is the center of Archosian strength; the larger and more well-fed it is, the stronger the Archosians are. Early game civics like God King are more effective than normal, and whatever you can do to increase the population of the capital is best. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Additionally, you'll want to save a couple of early spiders once they reach levels 4, 5, 6 and 7 in order to increase the size of the Brood Pit; while it might feel like a waste, it'll help make all of your other spawned spiders better as the game goes on, keeping you competitive. [NEWLINE]Author's notes: Due to spiders being able to quickly level up in early game beyond what warriors can defend against, it's generally frowned upon to use the Archosians in MP games on small maps. Played smartly, it's even possible to destroy another civ using just your starting spider and scout in the first handful of turns, so if there's a human playing as the Archosians, beware!
TEXT.French: Les Archosiens contrôlent les araignées et les scorpions, et excellent à empêcher l'exploration et l'expansion des autres civilisations au travers de leurs araignées et certaines de leurs mécaniques telles que la nationalité cachée et des promotions spécifiques (cf. Stratégie et mécanismes de l'[LINK=UNIT_SPIDER]Araignée Archosienne[\LINK]).[PARAGRAPH:1]Les [LINK=UNIT_SCORPION]scorpions[\LINK] agissent comme troupes supplémentaires, et apparaissent à la [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE_ARCHOS]Tanière de la Mère[\LINK], le Palais archosien, mais ont des caractéristiques différentes. Ils n'ont pas la nationalité cachée, et leurs attaquent empoisonnent l'ennemi, plus utile pour stopper les soins des unités attaquantes et les abattre plus rapidement, quand les araignées sont meilleures dans le contrôle de zone, éliminant les cibles faibles et sans défense.[PARAGRAPH:1]La Tanière de la Mère est le cœur du pouvoir des archosiens. Plus la ville l'abritant est grande et bien nourrie, plus ils sont puissants. Dans cette optique, les doctrines de début de jeu telles que la [LINK=CIVIC_GOD_KING]Monarchie de droit divin[\LINK] sont encore plus efficaces que d'habitude, et quoi que vous puissiez faire, augmenter la population de la capitale est la meilleure chose à faire, car la force des araignées est directement liée à sa taille. De plus, vous souhaiterez sûrement conserver quelques araignées une fois qu'elles atteignent les niveaux 4, 5, 6 et 7 pour améliorer la taille de la [LINK=BUILDING_BROODCHAMBER]Chambre des Couvées[\LINK]. Bien que cela puisse sembler du gâchis de sacrifier ainsi une araignée bien expérimentée, cela vous aidera à maintenir les araignées créées en milieu et fin de partie au niveau des unités plus puissantes, vous maintenant compétitif.[PARAGRAPH:1]Note de l'auteur : Compte tenu de la capacité des araignées à progresser rapidement au-delà de ce que les guerriers peuvent affronter, il est généralement considéré comme non fair-play d'utiliser les archosiens en miultijoueur sur de petites cartes. Joués intelligemment, il est même possible de détruire une autre civilisation en n'utilisant que votre araignée et votre éclaireur de départ lors des premiers tours de jeu. Donc, méfiance si un joueur humain incarne les archosiens !
TEXT.German: [TAB]The Archosians control spiders and scorpions, and excel at denying exploration and expansion of other civs. They do this through the use of their spiders, which have a number of mechanics and specific upgrades (see: [LINK=UNIT_SPIDER]Archosian Spider[\LINK] Strategy and Mechanics).[PARAGRAPH:1]Their [LINK=UNIT_SCORPION]scorpions[\LINK] act as supplements to their troops, also spawning through [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE_ARCHOS]Mother's nest[\LINK] (the Archosian Palace), but they have different properties. They do not have hidden nationality, and their attacks DO poison enemies, more useful for stopping healing of attacking units and wearing them down faster, whereas Spiders are better at zone control, picking off undefended and weak units. Archosian spiders have hidden nationality, meaning they can enter other players territory without declaring war. But, contrarily to units with [LINK=PROMOTION_HIDDEN_NATIONALITY]hidden nationality promotion[\LINK], they can't [LINK=SPELL_DECLARE_NATIONALITY]reveal their nationality[\LINK] and hence can't capture cities. [PARAGRAPH:2]Archosian spiders are not built. Instead, they spawn from [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE_ARCHOS]Mother's nest[\LINK] (the Archosian Palace). Capital population changes their initial size (baby if 4+, spiders if 8+, and giant spiders if 12+). Mother's nest is the center of Archosian strength; the larger and more well-fed it is, the stronger the Archosians are. Toward this end, earlygame civics like God King are even more effective than normal, and whatever you can do to increase the population of the capital is best, as spider strength is directly related to the size. Additionally, you'll want to save a couple of early spiders once they reach levels 4, 5, 6 and 7 in order to increase the size of the Brood Pit; while it might feel a waste of a perfectly good leveled spider, it'll help make all of your other spawned spiders in mid and late game match up to the strength of stronger units, keeping you competitive.[PARAGRAPH:2]Author's notes: Due to spiders being able to quickly level up in early game beyond what warriors can defend against, it's generally frowned upon to use the Archosians in MP games on small maps. Played smartly, it's even possible to destroy another civ using just your starting spider and scout in the first handful of turns, so if there's a human playing as the Archosians, beware!
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Gli Archosiani controllano ragni e sorpioni, ed eccellono nell'impedire l'esplorazione e l'espansione alle altre civiltà. Fanno ciò attraverso i loro ragni, che hanno diverse meccaniche come la nazionalità nascosta, e miglioramenti specifici (vedere: [LINK=UNIT_SPIDER_ARCHOS]Ragno Archosiano[\LINK] Strategia e Meccaniche).[PARAGRAPH:1]I loro scoprioni fanno da complemento alle loro forze invece, generati anche dal [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE_ARCHOS]Nido di Madre[\LINK] (il Palazzo Archosiano), ma hanno proprietà differenti. Non possiedono nazionalità nascosta, e i loro attacchi avvelenano i nemici, utile per fermare la guarigione delle unità attaccanti e abbatterli più in fretta, mentre i Ragni sono migliori a controllare una zona, eliminando unità indifese o deboli.[PARAGRAPH:1]Dal 3° livello, gli Scorpioni possono scegliere 1 colore tra 5 possibili (2 promozioni consecutive):[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Bianco (forza difensiva e più movimento nei terreni freddi; [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_GLACIALIS]Glacialis[\LINK], poi [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_GLACIALIS_GREATER]Glacialis Maggiore[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Nero (Veleno più forte; [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_MORTALITAS]Mortalitas[\LINK], poi [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_MORTALITAS_GREATER]Mortalitas Maggiore[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Verde (Forza nel deserto, può nascondersi e affinità al Mana del Sole; [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_VIDELICET]Videlicet[\LINK], poi [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_VIDELICET_GREATER]Videlicet Maggiore[\LINK])[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Blu (diversi poteri acquatici; [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_AEQUOR]Aequor[\LINK], poi [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_AEQUOR_GREATER]Aequor Maggiore[\LINK])[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Marrone (forza e movimento nelle colline e montagne; [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_RUTILA]Rutila[\LINK], poi [LINK=PROMOTION_SCORPION_RUTILA_GREATER]Rutilia Maggiore[\LINK])[PARAGRAPH:2]Il Nido di Madre è il centro del potere Archosiano; più è ampio e ben nutrito, più son forti gli Archosiani. A questo scopo, forme di governo come Dio Re sono più efficaci del normale, e qualsiasi cosa che aumentì la popolazione della capitale è la scelta migliore, essendo la forza dei ragni legata alla grandezza della capitale. In più, è consigliabile mantenere un paio di ragni una volta che raggiungono i livelli 4, 5, 6 e 7 in modo da incrementare la dimensione della covata; potrà sembrare uno spreco di ragni ben livellati ma fare ciò permetterà agli altri ragni che vengono generati di rivaleggiare le unità più forti, mantenendoti competitivo.[PARAGRAPH:2]Nota dell'autore: Essendo i ragni facili da livellare all'inzio della partita, portandoli ad essere più forti dei guerrieri in difesa, e generalmente malvisto usare gli Archosiani in MP su mappe piccole. Se giocati intelligentemente, è persino possibile distruggere un'altra civiltà, usando soltanto i ragni iniziali e i ricognitori, nei primi turni, quindi se un umano sta usando gli Archosiani, stai in guardia!

TEXT.English: [TAB]Corane's birth was no different from the others. No physical mutations, nothing irregular with the boy. Most children learned to respect and revere the spiders that routinely wandered through the streets, catching what small animals they could and bringing them to Mother or the village market. Corane was different. When he saw one of this spiders he would kill it. Crush it with whatever was nearby then pick it up carefully, so as not to damage the body. The Elders were appalled and his parents scolded and beat him mercilessly, but he continued to collect these dead spiders, keeping them in a small box. He would carefully pull off their legs and make designs with them. Several contained all eight legs, some did not. He separated the fangs and poison sacks from their bodies and kept them in a special jar as he studied what remained of the carcasses.[PARAGRAPH:1]One day Barbarian Orcs attacked his village, intent on pillaging and plundering whatever they could find. They had burst into Corane's house, expecting easy prey and much loot to be taken. However, in the center of the room stood Corane, holding what seemed to be a simple piece of metal, ornately decorated with small spikes and baubles dotting the surface. Unrecognized by the orcs, Corane's creation didn't stop them from attacking, but the poison sacks and still-venomous spider fangs caringly affixed to his club did stop their lives. The Orcs assaulted him, but one-by-one fell to his new weapon. The Orcs were eventually driven off and the villagers accepted Corane as a hero in the battle.[PARAGRAPH:1]As the years passed, he became a general in the army of the Archos. He commanded his troops be immunized to the poison of the spiders through experiments that would be considered illegal under most governments. When he was finished, he stood before a massive army, ready to give their lives to protect the Archos and to do the bidding of Mother. Following Daracaat's orders, he led this men to a small valley, the Valley of Spiders, and began build his own empire, keen on the destruction of all other civilizations around him. [PARAGRAPH:2]Corane paced back and forth in front of the prisoner. He looked the man over, and was once again disgusted. The man's hair was dirty and knotted, he wore clothes that looked like patchwork, and his skin seemed dirty enough to make even slaves cringe. The man was caught sneaking through the fortress walls with bundles of military papers. He was beaten and promptly brought to Corane for questioning. [PARAGRAPH:1]"You've come all this way. Traveled the great mountains. Gone through the haunted forest. All to try to spy on us. Tell me. What is it that you have come for?"[PARAGRAPH:1]The prisoner merely looked down, staunchly remaining quiet.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Very well, then. Agnir, show him what happens when prisoners do not comply."[PARAGRAPH:1]A rather gruff looking Archosian nodded and grabbed one of the prisoner's hands. Holding the hand to the ground, he slowly drew a wicked looking knife, chuckling. Down came the knife, off came the fingers, and out came the screams. The prisoner fell to the ground, clutching his now fingerless hand, sobbing and crying to Junil.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Now. Will you tell me why you have come all this way?"[PARAGRAPH:1]The prisoner merely spat on Corane's shoes and cursed Mother.[PARAGRAPH:1]"You dare insult Mother, you ingrate!?" Corane smacked the prisoner across the face. "Nobody, and I repeat, nobody insults Mother. Cut off his other fingers!"[PARAGRAPH:1]The prisoner screamed and protested as the guards held his other hand to the ground, his voice reaching a new intensity with a corresponding loss of digits. Corane reached out and grabbed the sobbing prisoner by the hair and held him up to look him in the eye.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Now tell me!" he bellowed, voice echoing off the stone walls. "Who are you!? Where did you come from!? Why are you here?"[PARAGRAPH:1]The prisoner sobbed slightly and held his now mangled hands close to his chest. "I...I was sent to spy on you. Learn your tactics, but that's all I know."[PARAGRAPH:1]Dropping the prisoner, Corane nodded silently, then whirled about and kicked the prisoner in the stomach. "Tell me all of it! All the truth!"[PARAGRAPH:1]The prisoner began to wail openly and cry hysterically. "I was to learn your military formations and your resources! TEXT.French: La naissance de Corane n'était pas différente de celle des autres. Pas de mutations physiques, rien de particulier avec ce garçon. La plupart des enfants apprennent à respecter et révérer les araignées qui se déplacent dans les rues, attrapant tous les petits animaux qu'elles peuvent pour les les apporter à la Mère ou au marché du village. Corane était différent. Chaque fois qu'il voyait une de ces araignées il la tuait. L'écrasait avec n'importe quoi à portée, puis la ramassait précautionneusement pour ne pas abîmer le corps. Les anciens en étaient consternés et ses parents le grondaient et le frappaient sans pitié, mais il continuait de collecter ces araignées mortes, les gardant dans une petite boîte. Il détachait les pattes et faisait des sculptures avec. Certaines avaient leurs huit pattes, d'autres non. Il séparait les crocs et les sacs de venin de leurs corps et les conservait dans une jarre spéciale tandis qu'il étudiait ce qu'il restait des carcasses.[PARAGRAPH:1]Un jour, des Orcs barbares attaquèrent le village, avec l'intention de tout piller et ravir. Ils firent irruption dans la maison de Corane, s'attendant à y trouver une proie facile et un beau butin. Cependant au centre de la pièce se tenait Corane, tenant ce qui semblait être un simple morceau de métal orné de fioritures telles que des petites pointes et des babioles parsemant la surface. Incapables d'identifier la création de Corane, les Orcs n'en tinrent pas compte et attaquèrent, mais les sacs de poison et les crocs d'araignées encore venimeux fixés avec soin sur sa massue mirent fin à leurs vies. Les Orcs l'attaquèrent, mais un par un succombèrent devant sa nouvelle arme. Les Orcs finirent par être repoussés et les villageois considérèrent Corane comme un héros de la bataille.[PARAGRAPH:1]Les années passant, il devint un général de l'armée archosienne. Il fit en sorte d'immuniser ses troupes au poison des araignées au travers d'expériences qui seraient considérées comme illégales dans la plupart des gouvernements. Quand il eut fini, il se tenait devant une armée massive, prêt à donner sa vie pour protégerles Archosiens et suivre la volonté de la Mère. Suivant les ordres de Daracaat, il mena son armée dans une petite vallée, la Vallée des Araignées, et commença à construire son propre empire, avec pour but la destruction de toutes les autres civilisations autour de lui.[PARAGRAPH:2]Corane faisait les cent pas devant le prisonnier. Il examina l'homme, et fut à nouveau dégoûté. Ses cheveux étaient sales et noués, il portait des vêtements qui ressemblaient à un patchwork et sa peau semblait suffisamment sale pour faire reculer les esclaves. L'homme avait été capturé tandis qu'il se faufilait par-dessus les murs de la forteresse avec des rouleaux de papiers militaires. Il avait été battu et immédiatement amené à Corane pour être interrogé.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Vous avez fait tout ce chemin. Franchi les grandes montagnes. Traversé la forêt hantée. Tout ça pour tenter de nous espionner. Dites moi. Pour quelle raison êtes-vous venu ?"[PARAGRAPH:1]Le prisonnier baissa simplement les yeux, se murant dans un mutisme absolu.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Très bien. Agnir, montre-lui ce qui arrive aux prisonniers qui ne coopèrent pas."[PARAGRAPH:1]Un archosien à l'air revêche acquiesca et saisit une main du prisonnier. Maintenant la main au sol, il tira doucement un couteau menaçant de son fourreau, en gloussant. La lame se baissa, les doigts se détachèrent, et les cris sortirent. Le prisonnier tomba au sol, serrant sa main sans doigts, pleurant et larmoyant à l'adresse de Junil.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Et maintenant, me diras-tu pourquoi tu as fait tout ce chemin ?"[PARAGRAPH:1]Le prisonnier se contenta de cracher sur les chaussures de Corane et de maudire la Mère.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Tu oses insulter la Mère, espèce d'ingrat ?!?" Agnir acquiesca et attrapa le rouleau d'un archosien proche.[PARAGRAPH:1]"L'ensemble. L'interrogatoire, l'aveu de culpabilité, tout." Agnir regarda Corane. Accompagnant les hurlements d'agonie, les sifflements des créatures et le son de leurs multiples pattes convergeant vers leur repas hurlant étaient une mélodie douce aux oreilles de Corane.

TEXT.Italian: [TAB]La nascita di Corane non fu diversa da quella degli altri. Nessuna mutazione fisica, nulla di irregolare nel bambino. La maggior parte dei bambini imparava a rispettare e riverire i ragni che regolarmente giravano per le strade, catturando i piccoli animali che potevano e portandoli a Madre o al mercato del villaggio. Gli Anziani erano inorriditi da ciò e i suoi parenti lo sgridavano e picchiavano a causa di questo suo comportamento, ma lui continuò a collezionare i ragni morti, tenendoli in una cassetta. Gli avrebbe rimosso attentamente le gambe e portato avanti dei progetti con loro. Alcuni avevano tutte e otto le gambe, altri no. Asportava le zanne e le sacche di veleno dai corpi tenendole in un barattolo speciale mentre continuava a studiare il resto della carcassas.[PARAGRAPH:1]Un giorno degli Orchi barbari attaccarono il suo villaggio con l'intento di saccheggiare qualsiasi cosa trovavano. Fecere irruzzione nella casa di Corane aspettandosi delle facili prede, con parecchio bottino da prendre. Ma al centro della stanza c'era Corane, impugnando quello che sembrava essere un semplice pezzo di metallo, finemente decorato con piccole punte e cindoli. La creazione di Corane non impedì agli orchi di attaccarlo, ma le sacche di veleno e le zanne di ragno accuratamente fissate al suo randello stroncarono le loro vite. Uno ad uno gli orchi caddero sotto i colpi della sua nuova arma. Gli orchi furono respinti e gli abitanti del villaggio acclamarono Corane come un eroe.[PARAGRAPH:1]Col passare degli anni, diventò un generale dell'esercito Archos. Ordinò che le sue truppe fossero rese immuni dal veleno dei ragni attraverso esperimenti che sarebbero stati ritenuti illegali dalla maggior parte dei governi. Quando finì, aveva davanti a se un imponente armata, pronta a dare la vita per protegger gli Archos e a eseguire gli ordini di Madre. Seguendo gli ordini di Daracaat, guidò quegli uomini in una piccola vallata, la Valle dei Ragni, e iniziò a costruire il suo impero, con l'intenzione di distruggere tutte le altre civiltà che lo circondavano. [PARAGRAPH:2]Corane camminava avanti e indietro davanti al prigioniero. Guardò l'uomo e ne fu di nuovo disgustato. I suoi capelli erano sporchi e annodati, i suoi vestiti sembravano essere stati rattoppati un numero elevato di volte, e la sua pelle era cosi sporca che avrebbe fatto rabbrividire perfino gli schiavi. Quell'uomo fu catturato mentre si muoveva furtivamente attraverso le mura della fortezza con delle cartelle di documenti militari. Fu picchiato e portato subito da Corane per essere interrogato. [PARAGRAPH:1]"Sei venuto fin qui. Scalando le grandi montagne. Attraversando le foreste infestate. Tutto questo per cercare di spiarci. Dimmi. Per che cos'è che sei venuto?"[PARAGRAPH:1]Il prigioniero si limitò a guardare in basso, restando in silenzio.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Molto bene allora. Agnir, mostragli cosa succede quando i prigionieri non collaborano."[PARAGRAPH:1]Il burbero Archosiano annuì e afferrò una mano del prigioniero. Tenendo la mano attaccata al terreno, sguaino letamente un coltello dall'aspetto minaccioso, ridacchiando. Il coltello calò, le dita furono tagliate, e le urla iniziarono. Il prigioniero cadde a terra, stringendo la sua mano ormai senza dita, piangendo e invocando Junil.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Ora. Mi dirai per che cosa sei venuto qui?"[PARAGRAPH:1]Il prigioniero si limitò a sputare sulle scarpe di Corane e maleddì Madre.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Tu osi insultare Madre, ingrato!?" Corane colpì il prigioniero in faccia. "Nessuno, ripeto, nessuno insulta Madre. Tagliateli le altre dita!"[PARAGRAPH:1]Il prigioniero urlò e protestò mentre le guardie tenevano l'altra sua mano attaccata al terreno, la sua voce raggiunse una nuova intensità ad ogni dito tagliato. Corane prese per i capelli il singhiozzante prigioniero sollevandolo per guardarlo negli occhi.[PARAGRAPH:1]"Dimmelo ora!" urlò, con la sua voce che rieccheggiava sulle pareti di pietra. "Chi sei!? Da dove vieni!? Perché sei qui?"[PARAGRAPH:1]Il prigioniero singhiozzo leggermente tenendo le mani, quello che ne rimaneva, vicino al petto. "I...Io sono stato mandato a spiarvi. Scoprire le vostre tattiche questo è tutto quello che so."[PARAGRAPH:1]Lasciando il prigioniero, Corane annuì silenziosamente, poi girò su se stesso e calciò il prigioniero nello stomaco. "Dimmi tutto! Tutta la verità!"[PARAGRAPH:1]Il prigioniero inizò a piangere in modo isterico. "Dovevo scoprire le vostre formazioni militari e le risorse a vostra disposizione! Dovevo scoprire i vostri piani e comunicarli al mio signore! Dovevo cercare debolezze nelle vostre difese! Questo è tutto ciò che so lo giuro!" Mentre finiva di urlare si raggomitolò sul pavimento di pietra, che si stava lentamente macchiando del suo sangue.[PARAGRAPH:1]Corane poggiò una mano sulla schiena del prigioniero e si chinò per parlargli. "E chi, se posso chiedere, è il tuo signore? O dobbiamo tagliare. altre cose?"[PARAGRAPH:1]Il prigioniero urlò e disse "Capria! Capria! È Capria, lo giuro!"[PARAGRAPH:1]Corane si rialzò soddisfatto e si voltò verso Agnir. "I nostri scribi hanno registrato questa sessione?" Agnir annuì e prese un pezzo di carta da un Archosiano vicino.[PARAGRAPH:1]"L'intera cosa. L'interrogatorio, l'ammissione di colpa, tutto." Agnir guardò a Corane. "Qual'è la sua sentenza, mio signore?"[PARAGRAPH:1]Corane guardò all'uomo di fronte a lui. "buttaelo ai ragni. Sono certo che Madre è affamata e desidererebbe un pasto... più esotico." Infine, Corane entrò nella sua sala del trono e chiuse le porte dietro di lui. Agnir e altri soldati sollevarono il prigioniero e lo buttarono dentro un buco. Gli urli di dolore, il sibilio delle creature e il suone delle loro zampe che convergevano verso la loro rumorosa preda erano come una melodia rilassante alle orecchie di Corane.

TEXT.English: The Haruspex turned toward him, spider's legs partly hidden by the black robe. "Daracaat. You are of Mother's chosen. You are the fiercest of your kind. You will lead the others when the ice passes". Daracaat looked up in surprise as the words were spoken and a cruel grin played across his features. [NEWLINE]"If that is Mother's will", he said. Something in his voice caught the attention of the Haruspex. A slight inflection, an insincere murmur, a trace of doubt.[NEWLINE]"Her will is not your's to divine, brute!" growled the Haruspex, two of its legs knocking Daracaat clean from his feet as they sprang forth from the cloak. He did not attempt to regain his feet straightaway, but lay stunned for a moment as the Haruspex spoke. "You do not need to concern yourself with what she wants, know only that I will be the one to tell you what is required of you. Her plan is beyond your knowing."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Daracaat regained his senses and smiled as he offered his reply. "I have a greater knowing of things than you may think, priest. I am aware that she does not speak to you, nor any of our tribe. What is she really? A Goddess? A Beast? It doesn't matter - she is Power. Your words direct us in her name and we follow. You wish me to lead the others - I will. I will take the power I am given and build the tribe strong, stronger than it ever was. We shall rule the surface whilst you remain here in your cave. My place will be unchallenged so long as you appoint me as Her champion. That shall be the way of it."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Daracaat left the chamber and headed back up the tunnel, closer to the surface with the rest of the tribesmen. The Haruspex remained. Thoughtful for a moment, he contemplated the best way to dispose of the oaf and who would replace him. [NEWLINE]"No, actually he will suffice for now", he decided. It was true that Daracaat was a fool, a simple and bloodthirsty barbarian, but that did not reduce his usefulness as a tool. "He will have enemies plenty enough to satisfy his hunger when we return above, and his victims will in turn feed Her."
TEXT.French: Le Haruspex se tourna vers lui, ses jambes d'araignée partiellement cachées par la robe noire. "Daracaat, vous êtes l'élu de la Mère. Vous êtes le plus féroce de votre race. Vous guiderez les autres après l'ère glaciaire". Daracaat paraissait surpris tandis qu'il parlait, et un sourire cruel se dessinait.[NEWLINE]"Si telle est la volonté de la Mère", dit-il. Quelque chose dans sa voix attira l'attantion du Haruspex. Une petite intonation, un murmure non sincère, une pointe de doute.[NEWLINE]"Ce n'est pas à vous d'interpréter Sa volonté, brute!", gronda le Haruspex, deux de ses pattes surgissant de sous son manteau pour renverser Daracaat. Il ne chercha pas à se reveler de suite, mais resta gisant tandis que le Haruspex parlait: "Vous n'avez pas à vous soucier de ce qu'Elle veut, mais seulement que je serai celui qui vous dira ce qui sera attendu de vous. Son plan est au-delà de voter compréhension."[PARAGRAPH:2]Daraccat reprit conscience et sourit tandis qu'il répondait: "J'ai connaissance de bien plus que vous ne pourriez le penser, prêtre. Je suis conscient qu'Elle ne s'adresse pas à vous, pas plus qu'à n'importe qui de votre clan. Qu'est-Elle en réalité? Une déesse? Une bête? Aucune importance, elle est le Pouvoir. Vos paroles nous dirigent en son nom et nous obéissons. Vous souhaites que je dirige les autres, je le ferai.Je prendrai le pouvoir et renforcerai le clan, afin de le rendre plus fort qu'il ne l'a jamais été. Nous gouvernerons la surface tandis que vous resterez ici dans votre grotte. Mon autorité sera incontestée tant que vous me désignerez comme Son champion. cela doit se passer comme ça."[PARAGRAPH:2]Daracaat quitta la chambre et remonta le tunnel, se rapprochant de la surface avec le reste du clan. Le Haruspex resta sur place. Pensif, il envisagea la meilleure façon de se débarasser de cet imbécile et qui pourrait le remplacer.[NEWLINE]"Non, il fera l'affaire pour l'instant", décida-t-il. Il était vrai que c'était un idiot, un simple barbare sanguinaire, mais cela ne le rendait pas moins utile en tant qu'outil. "Il aura suffisamment d'ennemi pour le satisafaire quand nous rejoindrons la surface, et en retour ses victimes La nourriront."
TEXT.German: Der Haruspex wandte sich ihm zu, die Spinnenbeine nur zum Teil bedeckt von der schwarzen Robe. "Daracaat. Ihr seid einer von Mutters Auserwählten. Ihr seid der Wildeste unserer Art. Ihr werdet die anderen anfÿhren, wenn das Eis schmilzt".
TEXT.Italian: L'Haruspex si voltò verso di lui, le zampe di ragno parzialmente nascoste dalla veste nera. "Daracaat. Tu sei stato scelto da Madre. Sei il più feroce di tutti. Tu guiderai gli altri quando il ghiaccio sparirà". Daracaat guardò su sorpreso mentre le parole venivano pronunciate e un sorriso crudela appariva sul suo viso. [NEWLINE]"Se questa è la volontà di Madre", disse. Qualcosa nella sua voce attirò l'attenzione dell'Haruspex. Una leggera inflessione, un finto mormorio, una traccia di dubbio.[NEWLINE]"La sua volotà non è tua da indovinare, bruto!" ringhiò l'Haruspex, sbilanciando Daracaat con due delle sue zampe che uscivano da sotto il mantello. Non tentò di rialzarsi subito, ma rimase stordito un momento mentre l'Haruspex parlava. "Non c'è bisogno che ti preoccupi di cosa lei voglia, sappi soltanto che sarò io a dirti cosa ti è richiesto. Il suo piano è oltre la tua comprensione."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Daracaat riacquistò i sensi e sorrise mentre rispondeva. "La mia conoscenza è più grande di quanto tu possa pensare, prete. Io so che lei non ti parla, ne parla a chiunque della nostra tribù. Cosa è lei veramente? Una Dea? Una Bestia? Non ha importanza, lei è Potere. Le tue parole ci guidano in suo nome e noi seguiamo. Tu vuoi che io guidi gli altri, lo farò. Prenderò il potere che mi viene dato e renderò la tribù forte, più di quanto sia mai stata. Noi domineremo la superfice mentre tu te ne stai nella tua grotta. La mia posizione sarà incontrastata sino a quando tu mi nimini Suo campione. È cosi che si dovrà fare."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Daracaat lasciò la stanza e si diresse verso il tunnel, più vicino alla superfice con il resto dei membri della tribù. L'Haruspex rimase. Pensando per un momento, contemplò il modo migliore per disfarsi dell'idiota e di chi lo avrebbe rimpiazzato. [NEWLINE]"No, andrà bene per ora", decise. Era vero che Daracaat era un'idiota, un barbaro semplice e sanguinario, ma questo non riduceva la sua utilità come strumento. "Avrà abbastanza nemici con cui saziare la sua sete di sangue quanto torneremo in superfice, e le sue vittime nutriranno Lei".
TEXT.Spanish: The Haruspex turned toward him, spider's legs partly hidden by the black robe. "Daracaat. You are of Mother's chosen. You are the fiercest of your kind. You will lead the others when the ice passes". Daracaat looked up in surprise as the words were spoken and a cruel grin played across his features. [NEWLINE]"If that is Mother's will", he said. Something in his voice caught the attention of the Haruspex. A slight inflection, an insincere murmur, a trace of doubt.[NEWLINE]"Her will is not your's to divine, brute!" growled the Haruspex, two of its legs knocking Daracaat clean from his feet as they sprang forth from the cloak. He did not attempt to regain his feet straightaway, but lay stunned for a moment as the Haruspex spoke. "You do not need to concern yourself with what she wants, know only that I will be the one to tell you what is required of you. Her plan is beyond your knowing."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Daracaat regained his senses and smiled as he offered his reply. "I have a greater knowing of things than you may think, priest. I am aware that she does not speak to you, nor any of our tribe. What is she really? A Goddess? A Beast? It doesn't matter - she is Power. Your words direct us in her name and we follow. You wish me to lead the others - I will. I will take the power I am given and build the tribe strong, stronger than it ever was. We shall rule the surface whilst you remain here in your cave. My place will be unchallenged so long as you appoint me as Her champion. That shall be the way of it."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Daracaat left the chamber and headed back up the tunnel, closer to the surface with the rest of the tribesmen. The Haruspex remained. Thoughtful for a moment, he contemplated the best way to dispose of the oaf and who would replace him. [NEWLINE]"No, actually he will suffice for now", he decided. It was true that Daracaat was a fool, a simple and bloodthirsty barbarian, but that did not reduce his usefulness as a tool. "He will have enemies plenty enough to satisfy his hunger when we return above, and his victims will in turn feed Her."

TEXT.Italian: Il Bosco Oscuro è un angolo selvaggio del mondo e un posto perfetto per i figli di Madre. I viaggiatori ignoranti e i visitatori indesiderati che vi entrano difficilmente vedono la luce del sole di nuovo.

TEXT.English: Viewed from the surface, the village of Anta seems much like any barbarian settlement, with its warriors, farmers and elders. Below the ground however, in caves only accessible to those chosen to enter, the true leader of the village lies dormant - a queen spider of titanic proportions. Known to the villagers as "Mother" and worshipped by a spider-cult drawn from the population, the spider waits.
TEXT.French: Observé depuis la surface, le village d'Anta ressemble énormément à n'importe quel campement de barbares, avec ses guerriers, ses fermiers et ses anciens. Cependant, sous la surface, dans des grottes uniquement accessibles à ceux autorisés à entrer, le vrai dirigeant du village reste endormi: une reine araignée aux proportions titanesques. Connue par les villageois sous le nom de "Mère", et adoré par un culte populaire autour de l'araignée, l'Araignée attend.
TEXT.German: Von oben betrachtet gleicht das Dorf Anta einem gewöhnlichen Barbarendorf, mit seinen Kriegern, Farmern und Weisen. Unter der Oberfläche jedoch, in Höhlen, die nur Auserkorenen zugänglich sind, ruht der wahrer Anführer des Dorfes - eine Spinnenkönigin von gigantischen Ausmaßen. Den Dorfbewohnern bekannt als "Mutter" und verehrt von einem Spinnenkult, der sich aus der Bevölkerung zusammensetzt, wartet die Spinne.
TEXT.Italian: Visto da fuori, il villaggio di Anta è simili a qualsiasi altro insediamento barbaro, con i suoi guerrieri, contadini e anziani. Sotto di esso invece, in grotte accessibili solamente a chi è stato scelto, il vero capo del villaggio giace dormiente, unaa regina ragno di proporzioni titaniche. Conosciuta dagli abitanti del villaggio come "Madre" e venerata da un culto che venera i ragni nato dalla popolazione, il ragno attende.

TEXT.English: Mother's Nest is at the heart of the Archos civilization. The prime concern of the tribe is to keep Mother happy and increase the size of her nest. This is reflected by increasing bonuses as the city containing Mother's Nest increases in size. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]City Size 4: May spawn Baby Spiders. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]City Size 8: May spawn Spiders. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]City Size 12: May spawn Giant Spiders. TEXT.German: PROBABLY OBSOLETE[NEWLINE]Das Nest der Mutter ist das Herz der Arachonischen Zivilisation. Das Hauptanliegen des Stammes ist das Wohlbefinden der Mutter und die Vergrößerung ihres Nestes. Dies spiegelt sich durch steigende Boni wieder sobald die Stadt das Nest der Mutter erweitert. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Bevölkerung 5: Babyspinnen können enstehen. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Bevölkerung 10: Riesenspinnen können entstehen. Ein "Dunkle Lande"-Gebäude (ersetzt Hain), das in einer beliebigen Stadt gebaut wurde, erhöht ebenfalls die Chance einer Ausbrütung.
TEXT.Italian: Il Nido di Madre è il cuore della civiltà Archos. La preoccupazione principale della popolazione della tribù è di mantenere Madre felice e di aumentare le dimensioni del suo nido. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Brood Strength 1: Requires City Size 4 and a Level 4 Giant Spider[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Brood Strength 2: Requires City Size 8 and a Level 5 Giant Spider[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Brood Strength 3: Requires City Size 12 and a Level 6 Giant Spider[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Brood Strength 4: Requires City Size 16 and a Level 7 Giant Spider

TEXT.English: A scorpion has been born in the nest.
TEXT.French: Un Scorpion est né à la Tanière.
TEXT.German: Ein Skorpion ist dem Nest entschlüpft.
TEXT.Italian: Uno Scoprione è nato nel Nido.
TEXT.Spanish: A scorpion has been born in the nest.

TEXT.English: A spider has been born in the nest.
TEXT.French: Une Araignée est née à la Tanière.
TEXT.German: Eine Spinne ist dem Nest entschlüpft.
TEXT.Italian: Un Ragno è nato nel Nido.
TEXT.Spanish: A spider has been born in the nest.

TEXT.English: Call Spiders
TEXT.French: Invoquer des Araignées
TEXT.German: Spinnen beschwören
TEXT.Italian: Chiama i Ragni
TEXT.Spanish: Call Spiders

TEXT.English: The Haruspex is able to call spiders into battle.
TEXT.French: Le Haruspex est capable d'invoquer des Araignées au combat.
TEXT.German: Der Haruspex kann Spinnen in den Kampf rufen.
TEXT.Italian: L'Haruspex è capace di chiamare dei ragni in battaglia.
TEXT.Spanish: The Haruspex is able to call spiders into battle.

TEXT.English: Devour Mate
TEXT.French: Dévorer le partenaire
TEXT.German: Gefressen werden
TEXT.Italian: Divora il Compagno
TEXT.Spanish: Devour Mate

TEXT.English: This spell allows an experienced spider to return to the nest to ensure future generations of the brood are strong. After the first time it is used, the Nest will gain a "Brood Chamber". Further uses require increasingly experienced spiders to upgrade the Broodchamber (the current level required for upgrade is displayed on the Broodchamber help text in the city).
TEXT.French: Ce sort permet à une Araignée vétéran de retourner à la Tanière afin de s'assurer que la future génération de la couvée sera forte. Après sa première utilisation, la Tanière aura construit une "Chambre des Couvées". Les utilisations ultérieures nécessitent des Araignées de plus en plus expérimentées afin d'améliorer la Chambre des Couvées (le niveau requis pour l'amélioration est affiché dans la bulle d'aide de la Chambre des Couvées dans la ville).
TEXT.German: Dieser 'Zauber' opfert eine erfahrene Spinne im Nest. Dadurch wird die nachkommende Brut nur noch stärker. Das erste Wirken des 'Zaubers' erschafft eine Brutkammer. Weiteres Wirken benötigt erfahrenere Spinnen und werter die Brutkammer immer weiter auf (das benötigt Level der Spinne und der Stadt wird im Brutkammer-Hilfe-Menü der Stadt angezeigt).
TEXT.Italian: Questa magia permette a un ragno esperto di tornare al nido per aumentare la forza delle future covate. Dopo la prima volta che viene usata, il Nido otterrà una "Camera della Covata". Ulteriori usi richiedono ragni sempre più esperti per migliorare la Camera della Covata (l'attuale livello necessario per migliorarla e mostrato nel testo della Camera della Covata nella città).
TEXT.Spanish: This spell allows an experienced spider to return to the nest to ensure future generations of the brood are strong. After the first time it is used, the Nest will gain a "Brood Chamber". Further uses require increasingly experienced spiders to upgrade the Broodchamber (the current level required for upgrade is displayed on the Broodchamber help text in the city).

TEXT.English: Feral Rage
TEXT.French: Rage Sauvage
TEXT.German: Wilde Raserei
TEXT.Italian: Rabbia Bestiale
TEXT.Spanish: Feral Rage

TEXT.English: Whilst the druid uses its affinity with nature to protect, the Haruspex uses it to drive animals into a furious rage.
TEXT.French: Tandis que le druide utilise ses affinités avec la nature pour protéger, le Haruspex l'utilise pour faire entrer les animaux dans une rage furieuse.
TEXT.German: Während der Druide seine Verbundenheit mit der Natur dafür benutzt, um zu beschützen, versetzt der Haruspex damit Tiere in eine fürchterliche Raserei.
TEXT.Italian: Mentre il druido usa la sua affinità alla natura per proteggerla, l'Haruspex la usa per spingere gli animali in una rabbia furibonda.
TEXT.Spanish: Whilst the druid uses its affinity with nature to protect, the Haruspex uses it to drive animals into a furious rage.

TEXT.English: Minor Brood
TEXT.French: Pondre Couvée Mineure
TEXT.German: Mindere Brut
TEXT.Italian: Covata minore
TEXT.Spanish: Minor Brood

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Consumes the "meat" resource, creates a half dozen or more Baby Spiders. Experienced Giant Spiders create more powerful Baby Spiders.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Détruit la "nourriture" et crée une demi-douzaine ou plus de Bébé Araignées. Les Araignées Géantes de plus haut niveau créent des Bébé Araignées plus puissantes.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verbraucht die "Fleisch"-Quelle, und produziert daraus 6 oder mehr Babyspinnen. Erfahrene Riesenspinnen erschaffen stärkere als unerfahrene.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Consuma la risorsa "carne" per creare sei o più Ragnetti. I Ragni Giganti esperti creano Ragnetti più forti.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Consumes the "meat" resource, creates a half dozen or more Baby Spiders. Experienced Giant Spiders create more powerful Baby Spiders.

TEXT.English: Glutted with sufficient blood Giant Spiders are able to reproduce at terrifying rate.
TEXT.French: Rassasiées avec suffisamment de sang, les Araignées Géantes sont capables de se reproduire à une vitesse terrifiante.
TEXT.German: Glutted with sufficient blood Giant Spiders are able to reproduce at terrifying rate.
TEXT.Italian: Riforniti con sufficente sangue i Ragni Giganti si possono riprodurre a una velocità terrifficante.
TEXT.Spanish: Glutted with sufficient blood Giant Spiders are able to reproduce at terrifying rate.

TEXT.English: Requires - and completely consumes - a Cow, Pig, Sheep, Horse, Deer or Artic Deer resource.[NEWLINE]For every level after the second the resulting Baby Spiders gain an Empower level. (Max Empower V.)
TEXT.French: Requiert (et détruit complètement) des vaches, des cochons, des moutons, des chevaux, des cerfs ou des cerfs arctiques (ressources).[NEWLINE]Pour chaque niveau après le second, les nouvelles Bébé Araignées gagnent un niveau d'infusion de puissance (Infusion de Puissance V maximum).
TEXT.German: Requires - and completely consumes - a Cow, Pig, Sheep, Horse, Deer or Artic Deer resource.[NEWLINE]For every level after the second the resulting Baby Spiders gain an Empower level. (Max Empower V.)
TEXT.Italian: Richede, e consuma completamente, una risorsa di Bovini, Maiali, Pecora, Cavallo, Cervo o Renna.[NEWLINE]Per ogni livello dopo il secondo i Ragnetti risultanti ottengono un livello di Potere. (Max Potere V.)
TEXT.Spanish: Requires - and completely consumes - a Cow, Pig, Sheep, Horse, Deer or Artic Deer resource.[NEWLINE]For every level after the second the resulting Baby Spiders gain an Empower level. (Max Empower V.)

TEXT.English: Awaken Mother
TEXT.French: Réveil de la Mère
TEXT.German: Mutter erwecken
TEXT.Italian: Svegliare Madre
TEXT.Spanish: Awaken Mother

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires a population of 16 in the nest-city.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Releases the Mother Spider from the nest to wreak havoc upon your foes.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requiert une population de 16 dans la Cité-Tanière.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Invoque la Mère des Araignées à la tanière pour ravager les rangs de vos ennemis.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Benötigt eine Bevölkerung von 16 in der Nest-Stadt.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Entsendet die Spinnenmutter aus dem Nest, um Verwüstung unter Euren Feinden anzurichten.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Richiede una popolazione di 16 nella città del nido.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Libera il Ragno Madre dal nido per devastare i tuoi nemici.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Requires a population of 16 in the nest-city.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Releases the Mother Spider from the nest to wreak havoc upon your foes.

TEXT.English: This Archos Worldspell unleashes a potent hero-unit, but being able to do so in a timely fashion requires a strategic decision early in the game. The spell requires the "Feral Bond" technology, which lies along the recon-line of technologies. Fortunately, this a strong line for the Archos anyway, but the scientific expense required to reach Feral Bond is significant and may hamper your development in other areas.[PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]Also be aware that you need to build your capital to size 15 before the world spell is available. The Nest building helps with happiness (provided you can find meat-resources) but you will need to carefully consider how to develop the Nest-city from the start. Everything your tribe does should ultimately be to improve the nest and please Mother.
TEXT.French: Ce sort mondial Archosien relâche une unité héroïque puissante, mais être capable de le lancer tôt implique de prendre un décision stratégique très tôt dans le jeu. Ce sort nécessitant la technologie "Lien Sauvage", qui se trouve dans l'arbre de technologie lié au renseignement. Heureusement, c'est de toutes les façons un arbre utile pour Archos, mais l'investissement en recherche nécessaire à la recherche de Lien Sauvage est important et peut handicaper votre développement dans d'autres domaines.[PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]Par ailleurs, gardez bien à l'esprit que votre capitale doit avoir au moins 15 de population pour que le sort mondial soit disponible. La construction de la Tanière aide à éviter les citoyens mécontents (à conditions que vous trouviez des ressources de type nourriture), mais vous devrez réfléchir attentivement à la façon de dévolopper votre Cité-Tanière dès le départ. Tout ce que fait votre clan devrait idéalement servir à développer la Tanière et plaire à la Mère.
TEXT.German: This Archos Worldspell unleashes a potent hero-unit, but being able to do so in a timely fashion requires a strategic decision early in the game. The spell requires the "Feral Bond" technology, which lies along the recon-line of technologies. Fortunately, this a strong line for the Archos anyway, but the scientific expense required to reach Feral Bond is significant and may hamper your development in other areas.[PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]Also be aware that you need to build your capital to size 15 before the world spell is available. The Nest building helps with happiness (provided you can find meat-resources) but you will need to carefully consider how to develop the Nest-city from the start. Everything your tribe does should ultimately be to improve the nest and please Mother.
TEXT.Italian: La Magia Mondiale Archos scatena una potente unità eroe, ma per poterlo fare al momento giusto e necessario prendere decisioni strategiche all'inzio della partita. La magia richede la tecnologia "Legame Bestiale", che fa parte della linea di tecnologie per la ricognizione. Fortunatamente, è una linea molto utile agli Archos, ma lo sforzo scientifico richesto per raggiungere Legame Bestiale è significativo e può rallentare il tuo sviluppo in altre aree.[PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]Ricorda inoltre che devi far crescere la tua capitale sino a grandezza 15 prima che la magia diventi disponibile. L'edificio Nido aiuta la felicità (se riesci a trovare risorse di carne) ma dovrai decidere attentamente come sviluppare la città del Nido dall'inizio. Tutto ciò che la tua tribù fa dovrebbe portare al miglioramento del Nido e al compiacere Madre.
TEXT.Spanish: This Archos Worldspell unleashes a potent hero-unit, but being able to do so in a timely fashion requires a strategic decision early in the game. The spell requires the "Feral Bond" technology, which lies along the recon-line of technologies. Fortunately, this a strong line for the Archos anyway, but the scientific expense required to reach Feral Bond is significant and may hamper your development in other areas.[PARAGRAPH:1][NEWLINE]Also be aware that you need to build your capital to size 15 before the world spell is available. The Nest building helps with happiness (provided you can find meat-resources) but you will need to carefully consider how to develop the Nest-city from the start. Everything your tribe does should ultimately be to improve the nest and please Mother.

TEXT.English: Invokes Mother, the Archosian hero.
TEXT.French: Invoque la Mère, l'unité héroïque des Archosiens.[NEWLINE]Voir le background pour plus d'informations
TEXT.German: Invokes Mother, the Archosian hero.
TEXT.Italian: Richiama Madre, l'eroe Archosiano.
TEXT.Spanish: Invokes Mother, the Archosian hero.

TEXT.English: Brute
TEXT.French: Brute
TEXT.German: Arachna
TEXT.Italian: Bruto
TEXT.Spanish: Brute

TEXT.English: Brutes are simply the fiercest and most aggressive of their tribe. Wielding a heavy stone or bronze axe, lashing out at times with teeth or clawed hand - these warriors show the first physical signs of Mother's toxic influence.
TEXT.French: Les Brutes sont tout simplement les plus cruels et les plus agressifs de leur clan. Utilsant une lourde hache de pierre ou de bronze, ruant parfois de coups de leurs mains griffues ou mordant, ces guerriers montrent les premiers signes physiques de l'influence toxique de la Mère.
TEXT.German: Brutes are simply the fiercest and most aggressive of their tribe. Wielding a heavy stone or bronze axe, lashing out at times with teeth or clawed hand - these warriors show the first physical signs of Mother's toxic influence.
TEXT.Italian: I bruti sono semplicemente i più feroci e aggressivi della loro tribù. Usando una pietra pesante o un'ascia di bronzo, usando a volte i denti o una mano artigliata, questi guerrieri mostrano i primi segni fisici dell'influenza tossica di Madre.
TEXT.Spanish: Brutes are simply the fiercest and most aggressive of their tribe. Wielding a heavy stone or bronze axe, lashing out at times with teeth or clawed hand - these warriors show the first physical signs of Mother's toxic influence.

TEXT.English: Boasting an increased strength due to +1 Poison combat, Brutes will often not feel the effects of lacking Iron Weapons. Even without weapon upgrades, these units are a solid choice.
TEXT.French: Profitant d'une force accrue grâce au +1 Poison (puissance de combat), les Brutes ne ressentiront généralement pas les effets du manque d'armes de Fer. Même sans les améliorations d'armes, ces unités sont un choix solide.
TEXT.German: Boasting and increased strength due to +1 Poison combat, Brutes will often not feel the effects of lacking Iron Weapons. Even without weapon upgrades, these units are a solid choice.
TEXT.Italian: Avendo una maggiore forza grazie al +1 da veleno, i Bruti spesso non sentono l'effetto del non avere Armi in Ferro. Persino senza armi migliori queste unità rimangono una valida scelta.
TEXT.Spanish: Boasting and increased strength due to +1 Poison combat, Brutes will often not feel the effects of lacking Iron Weapons. Even without weapon upgrades, these units are a solid choice.

TEXT.English: Chosen
TEXT.French: Élu
TEXT.German: Auserwählter
TEXT.Italian: Prescelto
TEXT.Spanish: Chosen

TEXT.English: The "Chosen" are those Archosians who display some physical mutation as a result of the time spent living in the spider's nest during the Age of Ice. In the most extreme cases, these mutations take the form of additional limbs or eyes. The Chosen are allowed entry to Mother's Nest itself and defend the cult from outsiders.
TEXT.French: Les "Élus" sont les Archosiens qui présentent des mutations physiques issues du temps passé dans la Tanière durant l'Ère Glaciaire. Dans les cas les plus extrêmes, ces mutations se manifestent sous la forme de membres ou yeux supplémentaires. Les Élus sont autorisés à pénétrer la Tanière de la Mère elle-même et défendent le culte des étrangers.
TEXT.German: The "Chosen" are those Archosians who display some physical mutation as a result of the time spent living in the spider's nest during the Age of Ice. In the most extreme cases, these mutations take the form of additional limbs or eyes. The Chosen are allowed entry to Mother's Nest itself and defend the cult from outsiders.
TEXT.Italian: I "Prescelti" sono gli Archosiani che possiedono qualche mutazione fisica dovuta al periodo di tempo passato vivendo nel nido dei ragni durante l'Era del Ghiaccio. Nei casi più estremi queste mutazioni si presentano sotto forza di arti o occhi addizionali. Ai Prescelti è permesso entrare nel Nido di Madre stessa e difendono il culto dagli estranei.
TEXT.Spanish: The "Chosen" are those Archosians who display some physical mutation as a result of the time spent living in the spider's nest during the Age of Ice. In the most extreme cases, these mutations take the form of additional limbs or eyes. The Chosen are allowed entry to Mother's Nest itself and defend the cult from outsiders.

TEXT.English: Chosen are the first Archos unit able to make use of Iron Weapons. Whilst they lack the late-game benefit of Mithril Weapons, they enjoy an innate bonus of +1 Poison Combat.
TEXT.French: Les Élus sont les premières unités archosiennes capables d'utiliser des armes de fer. Bien qu'ils ne puissent pas utiliser l'avantage des armes en mithril de fin de jeu, ils profitent d'un bonus inné de +1 Poison (Puissance de combat).
TEXT.German: Chosen are the first Archos unit able to make use of Iron Weapons. Whilst they lack the late-game benefit of Mithril Weapons, they enjoy an innate bonus of +1 Poison Combat.
TEXT.Italian: I Prescelti sono la prima unità Archos capace di usare Armi in Ferro. Nonostante non abbiano la possibilità di usare Armi in Mithril, possiedono un bonus innato di +1 da veleno.
TEXT.Spanish: Chosen are the first Archos unit able to make use of Iron Weapons. Whilst they lack the late-game benefit of Mithril Weapons, they enjoy an innate bonus of +1 Poison Combat.

TEXT.English: Eternal
TEXT.French: Éternel
TEXT.German: Ewiger
TEXT.Italian: Eterno
TEXT.Spanish: Eternal

TEXT.English: Haruspex
TEXT.French: Haruspex
TEXT.German: Haruspex
TEXT.Italian: Haruspex
TEXT.Spanish: Haruspex

TEXT.English: Haruspex are the priests of the Archosian spider-cult, fiercely dedicated to Mother. They share some of the same abilities as Druids, but whilst a Druid serves to preserve the balance of nature, a Haruspex utilises a darker and more unforgiving aspect of the wild.
TEXT.French: Les Haruspex sont les prêtres du culte de l'Araignée archosien, cruellement dédié à la Mère. Ils partagent certaines compétences avec les druides, mais tandis que le druide est dévoué à la préservation de l'équilibre de la nature, le haruspex utilise un aspect plus sombre et impitoyable des contrées sauvages.
TEXT.German: Haruspex sind die Priester des Arachonischen Spinnenkultes, Mutter geweiht und ihr Leben ihr gewidmet. Sie teilen einige Fähigkeiten mit den Druiden, aber während ein Druide versucht, das Gleichgewicht der Natur zu bewahren, benutzt ein Haruspex einen dunkleren und unverzeihlicheren Aspekt der Wildnis.
TEXT.Italian: Gli Haruspex sono i preti del culto dei ragni Archosiano, ferocemente devoti a Madre. Condividono alcune abilità con i Druidi, ma dove un Druido cerca di preservare l'equilibrio della natura, un Haruspex utilizza un'aspetto più oscuro e spietato di quest'ultima.
TEXT.Spanish: Haruspex are the priests of the Archosian spider-cult, fiercely dedicated to Mother. They share some of the same abilities as Druids, but whilst a Druid serves to preserve the balance of nature, a Haruspex utilises a darker and more unforgiving aspect of the wild.

TEXT.English: The Haruspex gains access to the Chaos sphere of magic, enabling a range of more aggressive spells. He lacks the potent summons of a normal druid however and must rely on his own strength and affinities to survive.
TEXT.French: Le Haruspex a obtenu l'accès à la sphère magique du Chaos, procurant une variété de sorts plus agressifs. Il lui manque cependant le puissantes invocations d'un Druide classique et ne peut compter que sur sa force propre et ses compétences pour survivre.
TEXT.German: Der Haruspex erhält Zugang zu der magischen Sphäre des Chaos, die eine Reihe offensiverer Zauber beinhaltet. Es mangelt ihm jedoch im Vergleich mit einem normalen Druiden an mächtigen Beschwörungen, und so ist er auf seine eigen Stärke und Verbundenheiten angewiesen, um zu überleben.
TEXT.Italian: Gli Haruspex ottengono accesso alla sfera della magia del Caos, permettendo un uso di magie più aggressive. Ma gli mancano le potenti evocazioni dei normali Druidi e può fare affidamento solo sulla sua forza e affinità per sopravvivere.
TEXT.Spanish: The Haruspex gains access to the Chaos sphere of magic, enabling a range of more aggressive spells. He lacks the potent summons of a normal druid however and must rely on his own strength and affinities to survive.

TEXT.English: Huntsman
TEXT.French: Veneur
TEXT.German: Waidmann
TEXT.Italian: Cacciatore Archosiano
TEXT.Spanish: Huntsman

TEXT.English: Archosian Huntsmen spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the Huntsman deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll.
TEXT.French: Les Veneurs Archosiens passent des semaines dans les contrées sauvages d'Erebus, pistant ses proies avec son compagnon Araignée. Lorsqu'il faut frapper, l'Araignée attaque et paralyse sa cible avec son venin avant que le Veneur fasse le tir mortel. Le clan a vécu avec les Araignées depuis si longtemps que le venin présent dans la carcasse n'est plus mortel pour eux (même s'il continue de prendre son dû).
TEXT.German: Archosian Huntsmen spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the Huntsman deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll.
TEXT.Italian: I cacciatori Archosiani passano settimane nelle terre selvaggie di Erebus, cacciando furtivamente le prede insieme a un ragno. Quando è il momento di colpire il ragno paralizza il bersaglio con il veleno per poi far dare il colpo di grazia dal cacciatore. La tribù ha vissuto con i ragni per cosi tanto tempo che il veleno presente nella carcassa della preda non è più mortale per loro, sebbene continui ad avere degli effetti spiacevoli.
TEXT.Spanish: Archosian Huntsmen spend weeks in the wilds of Erebus, stalking prey with a spider companion. When it is time to strike, the spider attacks and paralyses the target with venom before the Huntsman deals the deathblow. The tribe have been living with spiders for so long that the venom in the carcass is no longer deadly to them - though it does take it's toll.

TEXT.English: Using +1 Poison combat to make up what he lacks offensively, the Archosian Huntsman is a good choice for defending your lands against early invasion (especially from the barbarians, if your "alliance" proves to be "unstable").
TEXT.French: Utilisant le bonus de combat de +1 Poison pour compenser ses manques offensifs, le Veneur Archosien est un bon choix pour défendre votre territoire contre des invasions précoces (particulièrement des Barbares, si votre "Alliance" s'avère "instable").
TEXT.German: Using +1 Poison combat to make up what he lacks offensively, the Archosian Huntsman is a good choice for defending your lands against early invasion (especially from the barbarians, if your "alliance" proves to be "unstable").
TEXT.Italian: Usando il bonus +1 da veleno per compensare ciò che gli manca in attacco il cacciatore Archosiano è una buona scelta per difendere i tuoi territori contro le prime invasioni (specialmente quelle dei barbari, se la tua "alleanza" si dimostra "instabile").
TEXT.Spanish: Using +1 Poison combat to make up what he lacks offensively, the Archosian Huntsman is a good choice for defending your lands against early invasion (especially from the barbarians, if your "alliance" proves to be "unstable").

TEXT.English: Mother
TEXT.French: Mère
TEXT.German: Mutter
TEXT.Italian: Madre
TEXT.Spanish: Mother

TEXT.English: Light. Bright. Prey outside. Hunt. Kill. Feed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The massive form of the spider burst from the cave on legs like chitinous birch trees. The dwarves stood for a moment in shock as the beast speared the first of them. Panic swept the ranks of the Soldiers of Kilmorph and some began to run. Never before had they seen such a beast, and by Kandros' gold - it looked angry.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Kill. Feed. Kill. Feed. Kill. Protect the nest.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Haruspex emerged from the cave next, leading a host of giant spiders. Beneath them, the floor moved as a carpet of Mother's young raced ahead. As the first spells were cast, the dwarves were in full flight. Huntsmen were already in pursuit, few of their warriors would make it back to their mountain homes. The Haruspex attended Mother, expecting her to return to the nest. She did not. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Hunt. Kill. Feed. Hunt...
TEXT.French: Lumière. Brillance. Proie dehors. Chasser. Tuer.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]La forme massive de l'Araignée surgit de la grotte sur des pattes comme des bouleaux chitineux. Les nains restèrent figés de stupeur tandis que la bête harponnait le premier d'entre eux. La panique s'empara des rangs des Soldats de Kilmorph et certains se mirent à courir. Jamais ils n'avaient vu une telle bête, et par tout l'or de Kandros, elle semblait vraiment furieuse![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Tuer. Nourrir. Tuer. Nourrir. Tuer. Protéger la Tanière.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Les Haruspex émergèrent par la suite de la grotte, menant une horde d'Araignées Géantes. A leurs pieds, le sol se mouvait comme un tapis tandis que les rejetons de la Mère se précipitaient dehors. Tandis que les premiers sorts étaient lancés, les nains étaient en pleine fuite. Les veneurs étaient déjà à leur poursuite, peu d'entre eux reverraient jamais leur montagne natale. Les Haruspex attendirent la Mère, espérant qu'elle reviendrait à la Tanière. Elle ne revint pas.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Chasser. Tuer. Nourrir. Chasser...
TEXT.German: Licht. Helligkeit. Bete draußen. Jage. Töte. Friß.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Die massige Gestalt der Spinne schoss aus der Höhle, auf Beinen wie chitingewordene Baumstämme. Die Zwerge erstarrten einen Moment vor Schreck, als das Biest die ersten von ihnen durchbohrte. Panik erfasste die Reihen der Soldaten von Kilmorph, und einige flohen bereits. Niemals zuvor hatten sie so eine Bestie erblickt, und bei Kandros Gold - sie sah verärgert aus.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Töte. Friß. Töte. Friß. Töte. Beschütze das Nest.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Der Haruspex stürmte als nächstes aus der Höhle, gefolgt von einem Heer Riesenspinnen. Unter ihnen bewegte sich der Boden, als ein Teppich aus Mutters Jüngsten losraste. Als die ersten Zauber gewirkt wurden, befanden sich die Zwerge bereits in heilloser Flucht. Waidmänner nahmen bereits die Verfolgung auf, nur wenige ihrer Krieger würden es heim zu ihren Bergen schaffen. Der Haruspex begleitete Mutter, in der Erwartung, sie würde ins Nest zurückkehren. Was sie nicht tat. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Jage. Töte. Friß. Jage...
TEXT.Italian: Luce. Brillante. Prede fuori. Cacciare. Uccidere. Nutrirsi.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]La forma imponente del ragno usci dalla grotta su zampe chitinose che sembravano alberi di betualla. I nani rimasero un momento in stato di shock quando la bestia infilzò il primo di loro. Il panico si diffuse tra i Soldati di Kilmorph e qualcuno iniziò a scappare. Mai prima d'ora avevano visto una bestia come quella, e per l'oro di Kandros, sembrava arrabbiata.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Uccidere. Nutrirsi. Uccidere. Nutrirsi. Uccidere. Proteggere il nido.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Gli Haruspex arrivarono dalla grotta successiva, guidando un gruppo di Ragni Giganti. Sotto di loro, il pavimento era coperto da un tappeto di giovani figli di Madre che correvano davanti. Mentre le prime magie venivano lanciate i nani erano già in piena rotta. I cacciatori Archosiani erano gia all'inseguimento, sarebbero stati pochi i guerrieri nanici che sarebbero riusciti a tornare alle loro case nelle montagne. Gli Haruspex assisterono Madre, aspettandosi che sarebbe tornata al nido. Lei non lo fece. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Cacciare. Uccidere. Nutrirsi. Cacciare...
TEXT.Spanish: Light. Bright. Prey outside. Hunt. Kill. Feed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The massive form of the spider burst from the cave on legs like chitinous birch trees. The dwarves stood for a moment in shock as the beast speared the first of them. Panic swept the ranks of the Soldiers of Kilmorph and some began to run. Never before had they seen such a beast, and by Kandros' gold - it looked angry.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Kill. Feed. Kill. Feed. Kill. Protect the nest.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Haruspex emerged from the cave next, leading a host of giant spiders. Beneath them, the floor moved as a carpet of Mother's young raced ahead. As the first spells were cast, the dwarves were in full flight. Huntsmen were already in pursuit, few of their warriors would make it back to their mountain homes. The Haruspex attended Mother, expecting her to return to the nest. She did not. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Hunt. Kill. Feed. Hunt...

TEXT.English: Releasing Mother upon the world is one of the highlights of playing the Archos, but be careful not to let enthusiasm get the better of her. Whilst she is a competent unit in combat, she is far from invincible - and let's face it, when you're *that* big, you're going to draw some unwanted attention from your enemies... [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]She can in-fact be released twice (using the Birthright Regained ritual),the tales of her first death were obviously greatly exaggerated (she was just pining for the Fjords). Only one instance of Mother can exist at a time however.
TEXT.French: Lâcher la Mère à la surface du monde est un de vos objectifs lorsque vous jouez Archosien, mais attention de ne pas vous laisser entrainer par votre enthousiasme. Bien que ce soit une bonne unité de combat, elle est loin d'être invincible, et disons le clairement, quand vous êtes SI grosse, vous attirez malgré vous l'attention de vos ennemis...[ ][NEWLINE]En réalité elle peut être relâchée deux fois (en utilisant le rituel de Regain Inaliénable). Les récits de sa première mort étaient visiblement fortement exagérés (elle désirait juste s'accaparer les Fjords). Une seule Mère peut cependant être présente à la fois.

TEXT.Italian: Liberare Madre sul mondo è una dei punti salienti del giocare gli Archos, ma stai attento a non farti prendere troppo dall'entusiamo. Sebbene sia competente in combattimento non è invincibile, e ammettiamolo, quando sei *cosi* grande, finirai per attirare qualche attenzione indesiderata... TEXT.English: The Archosian Fort Commander UU has roughly the same effectiveness compared to a normal Fort Commander.
