TEXT.English: [H2]Archosian Spiders - Appearance and growth[\H2][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Archosian spiders are not built. Instead, they spawn from [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE_ARCHOS]Mother's nest[\LINK] (the Archosian Palace). Capital population changes their initial size (baby if 4+, spiders if 8+, and giant spiders if 12+)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Baby spiders automatically grow to spiders after a random time (hidden mechanism: [LINK=PROMOTION_GROWTH_SPURTS]Growth spurts[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Spiders can become giant spiders if the Nest's population has attained 12 by using the spell [LINK=SPELL_SPIDER_ARCHOS]Spider Upgrade[\LINK].[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Additionally, with Animal Handling, spiders can build the [LINK=BUILDING_SPIDER_WEB]spider web[\LINK] building, which provides a source of Silk (+1[ICON_HAPPY]).[NEWLINE][H2]Combat Features[\H2][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Archosian spiders (in fact all spiders) are invisible to all but recon units. They have the [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_BLOOD]spider blood promotion[\LINK], giving them +1 poison combat, but they do not give the poisoned promotion to units in combat (contrarily to scorpions).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Archosian spiders have hidden nationality, meaning they can enter other players territory without declaring war. But, contrarily to units with [LINK=PROMOTION_HIDDEN_NATIONALITY]hidden nationality promotion[\LINK], they can't [LINK=SPELL_DECLARE_NATIONALITY]reveal their nationality[\LINK] and hence can't capture cities.[PARAGRAPH:2]From level 3, Spiders can choose 1 color among 5 possibilities (2 consecutive promotions):[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Red (speed and blitz; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_RHAGODESSA]Rhagodessa[\LINK], then [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_RHAGODESSA_GREATER]Greater Rhagodessa[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Yellow (can cast Web spells; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_TEXTUS]Textus[\LINK], then [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_TEXTUS_GREATER]Greater Textus[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grey (strength and anti recon; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_MUCRO]Mucro[\LINK], then [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_MUCRO_GREATER]Greater Mucro[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Blue (various aquatic powers; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_ARGYRONETA]Argyroneta[\LINK], then [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_ARGYRONETA_GREATER]Greater Argyroneta[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Green (strength and ranged attack; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_VENENUM]Venenum[\LINK], then [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_VENENUM_GREATER]Greater Venenum[\LINK]).
TEXT.French: [H2]Araignées archosiennes - Apparence et croissance[\H2][PARAGRAPH:1]Les araignées archosiennes ne sont pas construites. Au lieu de cela, elles apparaissent à la [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE_ARCHOS]Tanière de la Mère[\LINK] (le Palais Archosien). La population de la capitale change leur taille initiale :[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]juvénile pour une population de 4+,[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] adulte pour une population de 8+,[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] et géantes pour une population de 12+.[PARAGRAPH:1]Les araignées juvéniles deviennent automatiquement adultes après une durée aléatoire (mécanisme caché : [LINK=PROMOTION_GROWTH_SPURTS]Poussée de Croissance[\LINK]).[PARAGRAPH:1]Une fois que la Tanière a atteint 12 de population, les Araignées peuvent devenir des Araignées Géantes en utilisant le sort [LINK=SPELL_SPIDER_ARCHOS]Évolution de l'Araignée[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]En outre, après la découverte du [LINK=TECH_ANIMAL_HANDLING]Dressage[\LINK] les Araignées deviennent capables de construire des "bâtiments"[LINK=BUILDING_SPIDER_WEB]toile d'araignée[\LINK], qui fournissent de la Soie (+1[ICON_HAPPY]).[NEWLINE][H2]Capacités de Combat[\H2][PARAGRAPH:1]Les araignées archosiennes (et en fait toutes les araignées) sont invisibles sauf des éclaireurs. Elles ont la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_BLOOD]Sang Arachnéen[\LINK], qui leur confère un bonus de +1 au combat empoisonné, mais ne donne pas la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_POISONED]Empoisonné[\LINK] au unités qu'elles affrontent (contrairement aux scorpions).[PARAGRAPH:1]Les Araignées Archosiennes ont la nationalité cachée, leur permettant de pénétrer sur un territoire ennemi (d'un autre joueur) sans avoir à lui déclarer la guerre. Mais, contrairement aux unités possédant la promotion [LINK=PROMOTION_HIDDEN_NATIONALITY]Nationalité Cachée[\LINK], elles ne peuvent pas [LINK=SPELL_DECLARE_NATIONALITY]révéler leur nationalité[\LINK] ni capturer les villes.[PARAGRAPH:2]À partir du niveau 3, les Araignées peuvent choisir une couleur parmi 5 possibilités (2 promotions consécutives) :[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Rouge (Vitesse et blitz; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_RHAGODESSA]Rhagodessa[\LINK], puis [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_RHAGODESSA_GREATER]Rhagodessa (Ancienne)[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Jaune (Peut lancer le sort [LINK=SPELL_WEB]Toile[\LINK]; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_TEXTUS]Textus[\LINK], puis [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_TEXTUS_GREATER]Textus (Ancienne)[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Grise (Force et Anti-Éclaireur; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_MUCRO]Mucro[\LINK], puis [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_MUCRO_GREATER]Mucro (Ancienne)[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Bleue (Pouvoirs aquatiques variés; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_ARGYRONETA]Argyroneta[\LINK], puis [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_ARGYRONETA_GREATER]Argyroneta (Ancienne)[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Verte (Force et attaque à distance; [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_VENENUM]Vénéneuse[\LINK], puis [LINK=PROMOTION_SPIDER_VENENUM_GREATER]Vénéneuse (Ancienne)[\LINK]).

TEXT.Italian: [H2]Ragni Archosiani - Aspetto e crescità[\H2][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]I ragni Archosiani non sono prodotti. Bensì, vengono generati dal [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE_ARCHOS]Nido di Madre[\LINK] (il Palazzo Archosiano). A seconda della popolazione della Capitale cambia la loro dimensione iniziale (ragnetto se 4+, ragno se 8+, e ragno gigante se 12+)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]I Ragnetti crescono automaticamente in ragni dopo un periodo di tempo casuale (meccanica nascosta: [LINK=PROMOTION_GROWTH_SPURTS]Growth spurts[\LINK]).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]I ragni possono diventare ragni giganti se la popolazione del Nido ha raggiunto grandezza 12 utilizzando la magia [LINK=SPELL_SPIDER_ARCHOS]Migliorare Ragno[\LINK].[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]In più, con Gestione degli Animali, i ragni possono costruire l'edificio [LINK=BUILDING_SPIDER_WEB]Ragnatela del ragno[\LINK], che fornisce la risorsa Seta (+1[ICON_HAPPY]).[NEWLINE][H2]Caratteristiche di combattimento[\H2][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]I ragni Archosiani (nei fatti tutti i ragni) sono invisibili a tutti tranne che alle unità da ricognizione. TEXT.English: Tribesman
TEXT.French: Tribal
TEXT.German: Stammeskrieger
TEXT.Italian: Membro della Tribù
TEXT.Spanish: Tribesman

TEXT.English: All Archosian Tribesmen are able to fight in defence of the nest, but the tribe has had little interest in weapon development relying instead on those tribesmen "better suited" by nature to fight.
TEXT.French: Tous les Tribaux Archosiens sont capables de se battre pour défendre la Tanière, mais le clan ne porte que peu d'intérêt au développement des armes, s'appuyant à la place sur ces Tribaux naturellement "taillés" pour le combat.
TEXT.German: All Archosian Tribesmen are able to fight in defence of the nest, but the tribe has had little interest in weapon development relying instead on those tribesmen "better suited" by nature to fight.
TEXT.Italian: Tutti i membri della tribù Archosiana sono capaci di combattere per difendere il nido, ma la tribù ha poco interesse nello sviluppo di armi affidandosi invece a quei membri naturalmente "più adatti" a combattere.
TEXT.Spanish: All Archosian Tribesmen are able to fight in defence of the nest, but the tribe has had little interest in weapon development relying instead on those tribesmen "better suited" by nature to fight.

TEXT.English: Archosian Tribesmen are limited to using only Bronze weapons. They do however enjoy a slight increase to City Defence and will defend their homes with great zeal. They also upgrade into the Brute unit, which can be powerful in the early game.
TEXT.French: Le Tribal Archosien ne peut utiliser que des armes de Bronze. Il bénéficie cependant d'une défense de ville améliorée et défendra son foyer avec zêle. Il s'améliore également en Brute, qui peut se révéler puissante en début de jeu.
TEXT.German: Arachonische Stammeskrieger sind beschränkt auf den Gebrauch von Bronzewaffen. Wie auch immer erfreuen sie sich eines leichten Bonusses bei der Stadtverteidigung und sie beschützen ihre Heime mit großer Emsigkeit. Sie können auch zur Arachna befördert werden, die eine mächtige Einheit in der Frühphase des Spiels ist.
TEXT.Italian: I membri della tribù Archosiana si limitano all'utilizzo delle armi in Bronzo. Hanno però un bonus nella difesa della città e difenderanno le loro case con grande zelo. Si possono anche migliorare in Bruti, che possono essere molto potenti all'inizio della partita.
TEXT.Spanish: Archosian Tribesmen are limited to using only Bronze weapons. They do however enjoy a slight increase to City Defence and will defend their homes with great zeal. They also upgrade into the Brute unit, which can be powerful in the early game.

TEXT.English: When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the Recluse relies on it to a greater degree.
TEXT.French: Quand un binôme de chasse survit suffisamment longtemps pour être remarqué, ils peuvent être envoyés encore plus loin pour chasser des proies encore plus dangereuses. L'Araignée devient plus dangereuse à mesure qu'elle grandit et le Reclus compte encore plus sur elle.
TEXT.German: When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the Recluse relies on it to a greater degree.
TEXT.Italian: Quando una squadra di caccia sopravvive alle terre selvaggie abbastanza a lungo da diventare degna di nota, può venir mandata più lontano per cacciare prede più pericolose. Il ragno diventa sempre più letale man mano che cresce e l'Eremita si affida a lui in misura maggiore.
TEXT.Spanish: When a hunting team survives the wilds long enough to become noteworthy, they may be sent further afield to hunt more dangerous prey. The spider becomes more deadly as it grows and the Recluse relies on it to a greater degree.

TEXT.English: A strong unit in the wilds, but relatively weak when attacking cities - the Recluse is best suited to intercepting enemies as they approach or hunting down wounded units.
TEXT.French: Une unité puissante dans les contrées sauvages, mais relativement faibles pour l'attaque de ville. Le Reclus est plus efficace pour intercepter les ennemis qui approchent ou achever les unités blessées.
TEXT.German: A strong unit in the wilds, but relatively weak when attacking cities - the Recluse is best suited to intercepting enemies as they approach or hunting down wounded units.
TEXT.Italian: Una forte unità nelle terre selvagge, ma relativamente debole quando si attaccano le città, l'Eremita è più adatto a intercettare i nemici quando si avvicinano o a eliminare unità ferite.
TEXT.Spanish: A strong unit in the wilds, but relatively weak when attacking cities - the Recluse is best suited to intercepting enemies as they approach or hunting down wounded units.

TEXT.English: Spiderkin
TEXT.French: Arachnomorphe
TEXT.German: Spinnentier
TEXT.Italian: Aracnomorfo
TEXT.Spanish: Spiderkin

TEXT.English: The most successful hunters may find that they develop mutations as they continue to eat the poisoned meat of their kills. This is seen as a "gift" from Mother and a sign that the hunter is favoured. In anycase, many of these mutations prove beneficial in combat and the Spiderkin is practically immune to further poisoning.
TEXT.French: Les chasseurs les plus efficaces peuvent découvrir qu'ils développent des mutations tandis qu'ils continuent de manger la viande empoisonnée de leurs victimes. Elles sont vues comme des "présents" de la Mère et un signe que le chasseur est favorisé. N'importe comment, la plupart de ces mutations se révèlent bénéfiques en combat et l'Arachnomorphe est pratiquement immunisé à tout empoisonnement ultérieur.
TEXT.German: Die erfolgreichsten Jäger mögen Mutationen an sich bemerken, wenn sie nur kontinuierlich das vergiftete Fleisch ihrer Beute verzehren. Dies wird als ein "Geschenk" von Mutter und als Zeichen ihrer Gunst angesehen. In jedem Fall entpuppen sich viele dieser Mutationen als nützlich im Kampf, so sind die Sipplinge der Spinnentiere z.B. praktisch immun gegen weitere Vergiftungen.
TEXT.Italian: I cacciatori di maggior sucesso possono sviluppare delle mutazioni in seguito al continuo consumo della carne avvelenata delle loro prede. Questo viene visto come un "dono" da Madre e un simbolo del suo favore. In ogni caso, molte di queste mutazioni si dimostrano utili in combattimento e l'Aracnomorfo è praticamente immune ad un ulteriore avvelenamento.
TEXT.Spanish: The most successful hunters may find that they develop mutations as they continue to eat the poisoned meat of their kills. This is seen as a "gift" from Mother and a sign that the hunter is favoured. In anycase, many of these mutations prove beneficial in combat and the Spiderkin is practically immune to further poisoning.

TEXT.English: Trading raw combat-prowess for deadly poison, the Spiderkin is a match for the Beastmasters of other races. In fact, his multiple additional limbs grant 1-3 first strikes, allowing him to more easily withstand attacks by groups of weaker opponents.
TEXT.French: Délaissant les prouesses au combat au profit des poisons mortels, l'Arachnomorphe est l'équivalent des Maîtres des Bêtes pour les autres races. Dans les faits, ses membres multiples lui confèrent 1 à 3 premières attaques, lui permettant de mieux résister aux attaques de groupes d'ennemis plus faibles.
TEXT.German: Den seltenen Heldenmut im Kampf ersetzt durch tödliches Gift - so ist der Sippling eine Herausforderung für die Bestienmeister anderer Rassen. Tatsächlich ermöglichen die zusätzlichen Gliedmaßen 1-3 Erstschläge, was ihn dazu befähigt, auch dem Angriff von Gruppen schwächerer Feinde zu trotzen.
TEXT.Italian: Scambiando della potenza in combattimento grezza per del letale veleno, l'Aracnomorfo è più che capace di confrontarsi con i Signore delle Bestie delle altre razze. Infatti, i suoi diversi arti in più gli forniscono 1-3 attacchi improvvisi, permettendogli di resistere più facilmente agli attacchi da gruppi di unità più deboli.
TEXT.Spanish: Trading raw combat-prowess for deadly poison, the Spiderkin is a match for the Beastmasters of other races. In fact, his multiple additional limbs grant 1-3 first strikes, allowing him to more easily withstand attacks by groups of weaker opponents.
